Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.utils

Class ContactValidator

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.utils.ContactValidator
public class ContactValidator extends Object
Utility class for validating contact information based on the contact type. This class contains methods to validate email, phone numbers, and social media links.

  • Constructor Details

    • ContactValidator

      public ContactValidator()

  • Method Details

    • validateContact

      public static void validateContact(ContactType contactType, String value)
      Validates the contact value based on the provided contact type.
      Parameters:
      contactType - the type of the contact (EMAIL, PHONE, SOCIAL_MEDIA_LINK)
      value - the contact value to be validated
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact value is invalid for the given contact type

    • validateSocialMediaLink

      public static boolean validateSocialMediaLink(String link)
      Validates the format of the provided social media link. This method ensures that the link is not empty or whitespace. The check ignores the presence of "www." at the beginning of the domain.
      Parameters:
      link - the social media link to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the link is a valid URL with http or https protocol and belongs to an allowed social media domain; false otherwise

    • validateContactList

      public static void validateContactList(List<CreateContactDTO> contacts)
      Validates a list of contacts ensuring the following: The list is not empty. There are no duplicate contact values for the same ContactType.
      Parameters:
      contacts - the list of contacts to validate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list is empty or there are duplicate contact values
